title: ID Brazilian newspaper headline font
content:
This font is gorgeous but thus far only seems to be used in bold by this newspaper. Any idea of its name and/or designer?

[http://typophile.com/files/yrr.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020163904/http:/typophile.com/files/yrr.jpg "http://typophile.com/files/yrr.jpg")

| --- | --- |
| [yrr.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020163904/http:/typophile.com/files/yrr.jpg) | 13.62 KB |
author: Curioustype

comments.content: Duh. Right you are and idiot I am. Thanks for the information.
What do they use for text?
